languages.text: "Ну вот, теперь мы оба знаем, что я имею право приказывать. Когда на кону безопасность целого сектора, игра перестает быть игрой и становится войной. Надеюсь, эта маленькая демонстрация власти не нанесла значимого ущерба чувству вашего достоинства".

"So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."
languages.original_text: "Ну вот, теперь мы оба знаем, что я имею право приказывать. Когда на кону безопасность целого сектора, игра перестает быть игрой и становится войной. Надеюсь, эта маленькая демонстрация власти не нанесла значимого ущерба чувству вашего достоинства".

traits.locale_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

"So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

"So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

"So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

"So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

languages.text: 「さて、これで私にはお前に命令する権利があると分かってもらえただろう。星域全体の安全が脅かされれば、ゲームはゲームでなくなり、戦争へと変わる。わずかな力をここで誇示したことにより、お前の威厳を深く傷つけてしまわなかったことを願っている」
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、これで私にはお前に命令する権利があると分かってもらえただろう。星域全体の安全が脅かされれば、ゲームはゲームでなくなり、戦争へと変わる。わずかな力をここで誇示したことにより、お前の威厳を深く傷つけてしまわなかったことを願っている」

languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

languages.text: “现在你我都看到了，我有权发号施令。当整片星区都陷入危机时，这场游戏就不再是游戏，而是战争。我只是小小地向你展示一下我的权力，希望这不会对你的自尊造成任何实质性的创伤。”
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: “现在你我都看到了，我有权发号施令。当整片星区都陷入危机时，这场游戏就不再是游戏，而是战争。我只是小小地向你展示一下我的权力，希望这不会对你的自尊造成任何实质性的创伤。”

languages.text: «Bueno, ahora los dos sabemos que tengo derecho a darle órdenes. Cuando la seguridad de todo un sector está en juego, el juego deja de ser juego y se convierte en guerra. Espero que esta pequeña demostración de fuerza no haya herido demasiado su dignidad».
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ahora los dos sabemos que tengo derecho a darle órdenes. Cuando la seguridad de todo un sector está en juego, el juego deja de ser juego y se convierte en guerra. Espero que esta pequeña demostración de fuerza no haya herido demasiado su dignidad».

languages.text: « Vous savez maintenant aussi bien que moi que je suis habilité à donner des ordres. Quand il y va de la survie de tout un secteur, le jeu cesse d'être un jeu. Le jeu devient une guerre. J'espère que cette petite démonstration n'a pas trop écorché votre dignité. »
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez maintenant aussi bien que moi que je suis habilité à donner des ordres. Quand il y va de la survie de tout un secteur, le jeu cesse d'être un jeu. Le jeu devient une guerre. J'espère que cette petite démonstration n'a pas trop écorché votre dignité. »

languages.text: "So, jetzt wissen wir beide, dass ich das Recht habe, Befehle zu erteilen. Wenn die Sicherheit eines ganzen Sektors auf dem Spiel steht, ist es kein Spiel mehr, sondern wird zu einem Krieg. Ich hoffe, diese kleine Machtdemonstration hat Euer Würde keine bleibenden Schäden hinzugefügt."
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: "So, jetzt wissen wir beide, dass ich das Recht habe, Befehle zu erteilen. Wenn die Sicherheit eines ganzen Sektors auf dem Spiel steht, ist es kein Spiel mehr, sondern wird zu einem Krieg. Ich hoffe, diese kleine Machtdemonstration hat Euer Würde keine bleibenden Schäden hinzugefügt."

languages.text: "Artık ikimiz de hangimizin emir verme yetkisi olduğunu biliyoruz. Bütün bir sektörün güvenliği söz konusu olduğunda oyun, oyun olmaktan çıkar ve savaşa dönüşür. Bu küçük güç gösterisi, dilerim onuruna çok ciddi bir hasar vermemiştir."
languages.original_text: "So, now we both know I have the right to give orders. When the safety of an entire sector is at stake, the game stops being a game and turns into a war. I hope this little demonstration of power did not do any substantial damage to your dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Artık ikimiz de hangimizin emir verme yetkisi olduğunu biliyoruz. Bütün bir sektörün güvenliği söz konusu olduğunda oyun bir oyun olmaktan çıkar ve bir savaşa dönüşür. Bu küçük güç gösterisi, dilerim onuruna çok ciddi bir hasar vermemiştir."
